Warrior.name: Destruction
Warrior.description: Deals outstanding amounts of <color=#f29e38ff>damage</color> and possesses great <color=#f29e38ff>survivability</color>. Suitable for various combat scenarios

Rogue.name: The Hunt
Rogue.description: Deals extraordinary amounts of <color=#f29e38ff>single-target damage</color>. The main damage dealer against Elite Enemies

Mage.name: Erudition
Mage.description: Deals remarkable amounts of <color=#f29e38ff>multi-target damage</color>. The main damage dealer against groups of enemies

Shaman.name: Harmony
Shaman.description: Applies <color=#f29e38ff>buffs</color> to allies to improve the team's combat capacities

Warlock.name: Nihility
Warlock.description: Applies <color=#f29e38ff>debuffs</color> to enemies to reduce their combat capacities

Knight.name: Preservation
Knight.description: Possesses powerful <color=#f29e38ff>defensive</color> abilities to protect allies in various ways

Priest.name: Abundance
Priest.description: <color=#f29e38ff>Heals</color> allies and restores HP to the team
